title: Orient Gateway
description: Summer 1938. Europe is teetering on the brink. In the far corners of the world, the intelligence agencies of the major powers fall into a frenzy of relentless warring. One Mr. Stern, an engineer, becomes the stakes in this shadowy conflict. In Istanbul, Max Friedman and the intoxicating Magda Witnitz will do everything to save him.
author: Vittorio Giardino
